game.title: Eternity's Edge
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, the fabric of reality is torn apart by rogue temporal agents. Players take on the role of a Chronos Guardian, tasked with preserving the timestream and preventing catastrophic changes to the past and future.
game.beginning: The game begins in a desolate, post-apocalyptic future where humanity has been driven to the brink of extinction. The player's character is awakened by an ancient artificial intelligence known as "The Architect," who possesses knowledge of the timestream and tasks the player with finding and stopping the rogue agents.
game.ending: After traversing through various eras of history, including ancient civilizations and dystopian futures, the player finally discovers the source of the temporal anomalies: a powerful being known as "The Time Reaver." In a final showdown, the player must defeat The Time Reaver and restore balance to the timestream, saving humanity from extinction.
